snippet.title: MotionSports - E3 2010: Live Action Announcement Trailer | HD
snippet.description:
Watch some people play air sports in this trailer for Ubisoft's Motion Sports. You too can put your fancy dress box to good use by buying Ubisoft's sports game for the motion-sensing Kinect Xbox 360 controller. 

PRE-ORDER: MotionSports - http://www.amazon.de/gp/product/B003UF5WV4?ie=UTF8&tag=xboxviewtv-21&linkCode=as2&camp=1638&creative=6742&creativeASIN=B003UF5WV4

MotionSports - E3 2010: Live Action Announcement Trailer | HD
Developer: Ubisoft
Release Date: 2010
Genre: Fun, Sports
Platform: Xbox 360
Publisher: Ubisoft
Website: http://www.ubisoft.com/
